meanings.definition: A strike or protest in which people refuse to work or participate in activities as a form of political protest.
meanings.sent1: During the hartals, workers stood together to demand better working conditions.
meanings.sent2: The hartals caused a disruption in the city's normal routine.
meanings.sent3: The hartals led to an unexpected day off for many employees.
meanings.sent4: The hartals were a powerful statement against the government's policies.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the hartals was felt across the entire industry.

meanings.definition: The act of closing businesses or services as a form of protest or strike.
meanings.sent1: The hartals resulted in the closure of shops and offices.
meanings.sent2: Business owners supported the hartals to show solidarity with the cause.
meanings.sent3: The hartals turned the bustling streets into quiet, empty lanes.
meanings.sent4: The hartals painted a vivid picture of unity among the workers.
meanings.sent5: The significance of the hartals resonated throughout the community.
